      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      This gets the square with a specific coordinate.
      Square[][] Board.getSquares()
      Returns all the squares on the board.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      boolean Square.equals(Square square)
      Checks if two square have the same coordinate
      boolean BoardManager.isValidCastling(Square kingSquare, Square rookSquare)
      Checks if it is valid Castling move
      boolean BoardManager.isValidEnpassant(Square s1, Square s2)
      Checks if the move is valid enpassant move.

      Checks if the given move is valid and safe.
      boolean BoardManager.isValidMovement(Square initSquare, Square finalSquare)
      Checks if the piece can make a valid movement to the square.
      boolean BoardManager.isValidPromotion(Square square)
      Checks if the square contains a pawn that can be promoted.
      void Board.makeMove(Square initSquare, Square finalSquare)
      This makes a move from a square to another.
      boolean BoardManager.moveMakesCheck(Square initSquare, Square finalSquare)
      Checks if the given move makes check for the moving player
      boolean BoardManager.promote(Square square, PieceType pieceType)
      Promotes a pawn to a newer piece.
